casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Gilbert Shawn CLARK. No. 393P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Gilbert Shawn Clark, Pro Se. Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 31st day of July 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Robeson County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
